answers.answer: Hun, I know its hard to stay calm in those types of situations... Trust me I know... First they told me I wasn't able to have kids... Then told me I would die giving child birth... Then two visits ago the couldn't find my babies heart beat... Trust me... I know how you feel... But instead of worrying... I prayed... I asked for family to pray... My church prayed... Friends prayed and even people I didnt know prayed for me... And guess what? My baby is perfectly healthy and so am i ... I am now going on 15 weeks pregnant
